pageContent: Objective: This study examined the predictive power of psychological flexibility, masculine self-esteem and stoicism in influencing psychological distress and quality of life in men diagnosed with prostate cancer. It explores relationships between these theorised predictors and prostate cancer physical symptoms, an established predictor of psychological distress and reduced quality of life.

metaData.source:
Follow-up of Prostatectomy versus Observation for Early Prostate Cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28700844/
